text: Wayyyyy tooooo expensive. $$$$ Trop trop cher. 350$/2 and you have to share half the plates!!! À 350$ pour 2 personnes, on ne devrait pas nous imposer de partager 2 entrées sur 3 et... le dessert! Surtout quand ce n'est nulle part mentionné sur la carte. La nourriture est excellente, le service attentionn? mais pas assez pour justifier 3 plats sur 6 à 2 fourchettes dans la même assiette.
Petit maison avec décor surprenant.   Menu gastronomique excellent... Petit bijou a Sainte Adele!!!

This restaurant was mind blowing. Went on a cold Sunday night, cute little place, nice art on the walls, sitting next to the fireplace, dim lighting, great music playlist... And then came the food. To die for! Go for the tasting menu. Only $60 and you won't regret your experience, I promise! It had 6 courses, which included a little squash/apple soup, oysters, seafood risotto, guinea hen served in 3 different styles in the same plate, local cheese with pear butter and for dessert fried apple donuts with butter rhum sauce and pistachio ice cream. If this doesn't make you salivate, I don't know what will. Presentation of the dishes was 5/5.  Awesome service, you definitely got to try this place even though it's a little far from the city. Can't wait to go back.

Pas Donné  Mais ce n'est pas juste un resto c'est une expérience il vous transporte durant 3 bonnes heures avec 7 services et nous avons pris la total,avec l'accord mets et vin. Le seul Bémol est qu'il ne laisse pas les bouteilles de vin, c'est suffisant, mais un repas de ce prix ça s'arrose plus que ça! Je vous le recommande, mais c'est $145 par personnes incluant taxe et pourboire.  A ce prix il ne sont pas seule.

I have driven by this place so often going up to my home in the country, for some reason after driving by it for the last 10 years, we decided to go try it! Omg what a treat to have this restaurant in the Laurentian!!! Seriously, everybody who loves food and good wine should go and try it out. I am going to tell everybody I know about this place. They have excellent service, friendly staff, great owner who actually cares about his clients and takes time to go talk with them at the end of the night, not to mention the food was creative and delicious.   I will be back, and I am looking forward to it.
